channel.title: About GraphQL Java Servlet on GraphQL Java Kickstart
channel.description: Recent content in About GraphQL Java Servlet on GraphQL Java Kickstart

item.title: Getting started
item.description: A working version of this example can be found at https://github.com/graphql-java-kickstart/samples/tree/master/servlet-hello-world. Build with Gradle First you set up a basic build script. You can use any build system you like, but the code you need to work with Gradle and Maven is included here. Create a Gradle build file Make sure mavenCentral is among your repositories. The example build script below uses org.gretty to provide a webserver to show a working example.
